seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' without senior/staff designation, Master's degree preferred (not required), no explicit years of experience mentioned - suggests mid-level role

job_family.evidence: Explicit title 'Data Engineer' and responsibilities focused on data pipelines, integration, and governance

sub_specialty.evidence: Explicitly titled 'Data Consultant-Data Governance', with must-have skills including 'data governance', 'data lineage', 'metadata analysis', and tools Alation/Manta

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people management, team leadership, or architectural oversight - responsibilities focus on implementation and collaboration

primary_cloud.evidence: No cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP) mentioned in job description or Pass 1 extraction

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud platforms mentioned at all

processing_paradigm.evidence: Explicitly mentions 'both batch and real-time processing' in responsibilities

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools (Airflow, Dagster, etc.) mentioned in requirements or description

storage_layer.evidence: No specific storage technologies (warehouse, lake, lakehouse) mentioned beyond general 'data gathering, storage'

remote_restriction.evidence: Location restricted to 'Pune, Maharashtra, India' with onsite work model - implies regional restriction

timezone_focus.evidence: Explicit location restriction to India (Pune, Maharashtra) with onsite requirement

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model in Pune, Maharashtra, India implies relocation may be required for non-local candidates

h1b_friendly.evidence: Location is Pune, India - H1B is a US visa; no visa sponsorship mentioned for international candidates

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: OPT/CPT are US student visa categories; position is in India with no mention of supporting international student visas

citizenship_required.evidence: Location in India implies authorization to work in India is required; no citizenship requirement stated

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position at IBM (large corporation) implies W2 employment status

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits listed in Pass 1 extraction or job description

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'work with diverse teams' and 'deliver deep technical expertise' but no specific career tracks or promotion paths

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions 'collaborating closely with diverse teams' and 'partnering with other scientists, engineers, consultants' - implies learning from experienced colleagues

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotions, advancement, or career progression in job description or Pass 1 extraction

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring other roles within IBM

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned in the job posting

requirement_strictness.evidence: All listed skills are under 'must_have_hard_skills' with no 'nice_to_have' skills - suggests strict requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused on data governance, lineage, and integration with specific tools (Alation, Manta) - well-defined scope

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills align with data governance specialization; no unrealistic combinations or senior requirements for junior role
